session_completed.reason: Clear termination message: 'Loop terminated: Too many consecutive failures' with final status box showing 5 iterations and 8.5s elapsed time. Shell prompt returned at end (❯)

no_critical_errors.reason: Output contains expected ANSI escape codes (colors, formatting). Warnings about parsing failures are expected application-level logs, not critical system errors. Text is fully readable and properly formatted

content_present.reason: Abundant meaningful output including timestamps, INFO/WARN log messages, event loop processing details, and a formatted termination report box with statistics

overall_reason: Session successfully completed with proper termination. Application logged expected warnings during execution but finished cleanly with visible summary. All validation checks pass.
